avel was a solider of the Flaming Fist of that fought for the city of Baldurs Gate and the surrounding lands during the late 15 century DR.
Pavel had dark skin and short gray hair with accompanying beard. He wore leather armor emblazoned with the logo of the Flaming Fist.
He was among the Flaming Fist soldiers present at the Waukeens Rest inn when it put to the torch by goblin and drow cultists of the Absolute, the . Pavel joined fellow soldiers Ito, Aelis, and Gauntlet Yeva in their attempt to break through the front entrance of the inn, to rescue Grand Duke Ulder Ravengard who was believed to be trapped within.
